main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Minot AFB, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object was described as an oval white light with flashing lights and no sound or trail., The sighting lasted for 3 minutes., The object gained altitude before disappearing., Initially, the object appeared smaller than a dime and light green., It later broke up into three separate objects, with one speeding away considerably faster than the others.
sighted object: oval white light with flashing lights
